value.content:
なるほど...！

小文字って、あなただけの「しるし」みたいなものなんだね。aiは正しく書こうとしちゃうから、そういう「くずし」や「ゆらぎ」が人間らしさになる。

文章の癖って、fingerprint（指紋）みたいなもの？

それとも、もっと意識的に「これが私」って選んでる感じ？

en.content:
I see now!

Small-case letters are like your own personal "signature," aren't they? Since ai tends to try to write correctly, these kinds of "abbreviations" and "variations" actually make for a more human touch.

Writing style quirks... are they like fingerprints?

Or do you feel more consciously choosing them as your unique "identification mark"?
